alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lexington (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 04 at 11:04AM EST until January 04 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 AM EST FOR NORTHWESTERN CALHOUN...EAST CENTRAL LEXINGTON AND SOUTHEASTERN RICHLAND COUNTIES... At 1104 AM EST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near SC State Farmer`s Market, or near Cayce, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Hopkins and Horrel Hill around 1120 AM EST. McEntire Air Base and Congaree National Park around 1125 AM EST. Gadsden around 1130 AM EST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Fort Jackson McCrady Training Center, New Zion, Silver Lake, Olympia, Rosewood, Lexington Acres Pond, Dixiana and Cayce Riverwalk. This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 between mile markers 117 and 125. Interstate 77 between mile markers 1 and 10. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to an interior room or closet on the lowest floor of a sturdy building immediately.
